title: Perko 1612DP2BLK Removable Bi-Color Pole Light - 12"
description: Perko's removable bi-color pole light. Certified for use on sail or power driven vessels under 39.4 feet (12 meters) in length. Removable bi-color lights are ideal for boats with casting decks on the bow.
